about_the_game:
Machines Book

This Machines-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Cogs and Gears and Pistons, oh my!

Covering images of all kinds of machines and moving parts!

Contents

The Machines book unlocks the following images:
  • Elevator - 49x230
  • Coffee Machine - 52x76
  • Car Engine - 58x39
  • Oil Drilling - 72x102
  • Clockwork - 74x120
  • Turnspit Dog - 82x91
  • Gears - 83x89
  • Claw Machine - 83x97
  • Automation - 100x100
  • Robot - 104x116
  • Sewing Machine - 105x80
  • Steam Engine - 106x93
  • Battery Powered - 114x86
  • 3D Printer - 126x113
  • Tractor interior - 130x88
  • Jet Engine - 137x50
  • Blueprint - 149x146
  • Hydraulics - 150x129
  • Steam Train - 192x76
  • Heavy Machinery - 220x144

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Machines Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
